text:
After my fun talk, someone kindly this fab happiness curve for robotics professionals. The peak, after weeks of slog is “it works!” ... the trough is “it only worked for an hour and then it fell down stairs and it just broke and I have to fix it and ug.” 
#CLL19 https://t.co/UqPpGTVnvv

author.description: @RedHat - Senior Principal Software Engineer, working on @QuarkusIO. Ex-IBM. Java Champion, developer, author, #cloud surfer and maker. My views are my own.
author.name: Holly Cummins (holly_cummins@hachyderm.io)
